channel.title: How to change exp of 99 s
channel.description:
Currently, my exp of getting a 99 skil is 6,517,253 exp. I can't figure out how to change that to 13m like in real runescape. Any help would be appreciated.
Thanks, Inferno

item.title: How to change exp of 99 s
item.dc:creator: @inferno_vann inferno vann
item.source: How to change exp of 99 s

item.title: How to change exp of 99 s
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 99; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 0; }

Read full topic
item.source: How to change exp of 99 s
